p: Finally, the use of bioinformatic tools based on a multi-omic modelling work could be useful to improve the Ulva valorization process, to predict Ulva blooms and to evaluate the ecological impact resulting from the introduction of a virus in a different ecological system. Compared to approaches applying machine learning on omic data directly, a multi-view approach merging experimentally and model-generated omic data can include key mechanistic information in an otherwise biology-agnostic machine learning process [ 122].
